text:
@senatemajldr 😷🖕Lies and projection. You’re holding relief spending hostage in exchange for complete corporate immunity for exposing workers and workplaces to the coronavirus. 
$30 BILLION for Pentagon pet projects. No concern for folks who can’t pay their rent tomorrow. Go straight to Hell.
